title: On this Promise day
author: Benjamin G Nechicattu
description: You really need to be careful with your promises. They can be a double-edged sword. You can make a promise to someone and then break it, or you can make a promise to yourself and keep it. It's all about how you handle them.
content:
On this promise day,  
   I want you to know that,  
 No matter where you are,  
 No matter what time it is,  
 You can come to me,  
 And I will be there for your,  
 And I promise to stand by your side.  
 You will never have to face   
 anything, anytime, anywhere  
 Alone!
